'''Traveler's Original Sword''' is the weapon used by the [[Traveler]]s in their opening cutscene fight against the [[Unknown God]]. An altered version covered in purple mist is seen wielded by the [[Traveler's Sibling]] in the {{Quest|We Will Be Reunited}} and in {{Quest|Bedtime Story}}.
